comment: Professor Almeda was an AMAZING lecturer. He cares about his students doing well and is always available for questions. 4 tests and about 1 quiz every week to every other week in person. Material is straight from PowerPoints and there is a helpful review session for each exam. I will definitely take him again if I get the chance!

Lectures are neat and straight to the point. His review days before exams helped a lot because they were similar. His homework assignments or activities are not hard at all. Personality is also great, he likes to connect and is very understanding with his students.

I LOVE LOVE LOVE Professor Almeida. He made learning very interesting. My favorite teacher is the ES program. Quizzes in person, and 4 Exams but everything was straight from the powerpoint. If you study, you will get an A. He gives opportunity for extra credit. He is the absolutely amazing 10/10 recommend.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: ES 2100 was super easy with Almeda. Assignments are easy to complete and he isn't tough with grading. Tests are straightforward and aren't too long. He likes class participation!
This class is such a waste of time and his condescending attitude does not help things. I learned nothing from this class and his sarcastic remarks about physical appearance helped me none.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: My favorite professor I have had so far. He made me want to go to my 10:00 MWF every time we had class. Tests and quizzes are not too difficult if you study the powerpoints provided. He has extra credit points available from in class activities. Lots of review before tests which is very helpful. Take him if you can!

Great personality. Gives quizzes and tests in class and encourages student interaction. His quizzes are very specific so make sure you study the material seriously, and expect to be surprised with questions that you do not know. His tests are easier than his quizzes though. 4 tests with in person activities.

He is a very good professor and you can tell he loves what he does. Very caring of his students. Just one thing is he is a bit tough grader- he says he won't be but he actually is. Encourages Participation. 3 practical exams (in which you demonstrate exercises) and one big project in the end. 
attendance counts.

I loved my class with Christian. He made the class a lot of fun, especially for something that is kind of intimidating. I made a lot of good friends in his class as well as learned things that I will always use.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: New at teaching but is great. This is an easy class. Make sure you just show up to class and get an understanding of all the exercises that you are doing since you will be doing practicals. Great professor.
